description:
The world leading innovation software company is looking for talented Senior .NET Developer†to work as part of a professional team of world lead company who are developing OWN software that helps engineers, scientists and researchers to develop, maintain and produce breakthrough products.†

Powered by world-class semantic search technology, our product transforms internal and external information into actionable innovation intelligence.


OPEN POSITION PROFILE:

  • Experience in IT industry: not less than 4 years.†
  • In-depth understanding of one or more high level programming languages, C# is the required one.
  • Thorough knowledge of one of following technologies (Web, Net, database technologies).
  • Knowledge and practical usage of ASP MVC and MVVM patterns.
  • Demonstrated project and program management experience including estimating and managing time lines.
  • Must be able to effectively communicate technical information to both technical and non-technical personnel.
  • Team-player (teamwork experience, not less than 4 teammates).
  • Spoken and written English with practical experience.
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication.

NICE TO HAVE:

  • C# unit testing experience is appreciated.


BENEFITS:

  • Interesting work in friendly team, broad opportunities for professional and career growth.
  • Unique functionality of own product development: semantic analysis and search, artificial intelligence,cloud computing, modern technologies.
  • Planned, well-defined and non-stop evolving development process.
  • High legal salaries and permanent assessment of personal contribution.
  • Leading edge and modern software development area.
  • Excellent working environment .
  • Customer Delight Award Ц all permanent employees of IHS are entitled to receive shares in the company each year subject to the company meeting agreed performance targets (and subject to employees meeting the eligibility criteria).


ABOUT COMPANY:

  • Invention Machine develops Software platform which helps human invent and innovate faster in times. It is unique innovation software that drives sustainable innovation Ц bringing structure, uniformity and repeatability to innovation processes across the product life cycle. Goldfire fuses innovation tools and methodologies with access to actionable knowledge and the ability to collaborate with others to stimulate idea generation and speed problem resolution. † † † † † † †


WHAT THE WORLD WRITE ABOUT US:

  • УInvention Machine Corp. has developed a software program that is being snapped up by a growing number of AmericaТs biggest companies ЕФ Ц Wall Street Journal.
  • УInvention Machine software is a leading example of creativity software, a class of programs aimed at raising the IQ of research and development in a time of global competition, brutally short product cycles, and constant cost-cutting.Ф Ц Business Week.
  • УInvention Machine software promises to do for creativity of product and process designers what CADdid for draftsman.Ф Ц Fortune.
  • †† УGoldfire Innovator provides a problem-solving workbench that should be no more than a click away from the desktop of every product development engineer serious about improving their problem-solving competency.Ф Ц Ventana Research.


Invention Machine has been acquired by IHS http://www.ihs.com/
name: Senior .NET Developer (C#)
